lines: REDEEMED! HOW I LOVE TO PROCLAIM IT
1. Nalipusushiwa, nasosa, Mu mulopa wa Mwana Lesa;
Ampususha no luse lwa-kwe, Nomba ndi mwana wakwe pe
Yesu Yesu, Yesu ni Katula wandi;
Yesu, Yesu, Nomba ndi mwana wakwe pe.
Naishiba nshili no mwenso, Imfumu ili mupepi.
Ndeimba lulumbi lwamfumu, Ndeimba uluse lwakwe.
4. Naishiba nkalamumona, Mfumu mu lulumbi lwakwe;
Mafunde yakwe naya temwa, Yapelwa ku bantu bonse.
5. Naishiba kuli citebo, Mu masano ya kumulu;
Bwangu pamo na bapusuka, Tukekala kumwakwe pe.
